roleset.name: distinguished, signified

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: Calcific atheromatous plaque is most marked at the bifurcation.

example.name: With arg 0 as signifier
example.text: IGF-1 longevity is marked by reduced protein metabolism

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to mark.01. Mark.01 is a member of VN class appoint-29.1. Framed by Katie.
